LanguageData.S.LetterQuantityUnidendified: Number of aproaching entities is unknown.
LanguageData.S.DetectedColonists: Colonists have detected unusual movement, coming towards your base.
LanguageData.S.DetectedWanderer: Who said wandering is bad? One the colonists has seen something moving in the distance.
LanguageData.S.DetectedVision: One of your colonists had a vision, and others confirmed their suspicion. Something is coming.
LanguageData.S.DetectedWatchtower: While resting on a watchtower, one of your colonists saw movement in the distance. Something is coming.
LanguageData.S.DetectedWater: While meditating, one of your colonists saw vibration in the water. Something is coming.
LanguageData.S.DetectedTech: Our motion tracking technology detected unusual movement in the distance, coming towards your base.
LanguageData.S.DetectedSatellite: Your satellite controller decrypted a communication from an abandoned mechanoid satellite. That satellite is sending an signal to a party telling them to go to your region.
LanguageData.S.DetectedScanner: One of your scanners is going crazy. The colonist monitoring it suggests to prepare for a possible upcoming attack.
LanguageData.S.DetectedMachineLearning: Machine vision algorithms monitoring your sensors have determined something is moving towards your base.
LanguageData.S.DetectedTechConsistent: While colonists were busy with everyday chores, spotting tech reported an unusual change. Prepare for visitors.
LanguageData.S.TypeUnidentified_1: There is not enought evidence to identify what kinds of entities are coming.
LanguageData.S.TypeUnidentified_2: None of the colonists were able to identify aproaching entities.
LanguageData.S.TypeUnidentifiedQuarrel: After a heated debate over ambigious data, colonist could not determine on what kind of entity is approaching.
LanguageData.S.BaseType_1: Colonists have determined that {0} is coming.
LanguageData.S.BaseType_2: The approaching movement is identified as {0}.
LanguageData.S.TypeTower: Based on observations from a watchtower, your colonists think that is coming a {0}.
LanguageData.S.TypeSattellite: Satellites have determined that {0} is coming.
